text: Gary Hurlstone (born 25 April 1963) is an English former professional footballer who played as a striker in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Gainsborough Trinity, Worksop Town, Mexborough Town, Hatfield Main, Bridlington Town, Goole Town, Bishop Auckland, Buxton and Stocksbridge Park Steels. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:People from Mexborough Category:Footballers from Doncaster Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:Worksop Town F.C. players Category:Mexborough Town F.C. players Category:Hatfield Main F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Bridlington Town A.F.C. players Category:Goole Town F.C. players Category:Bishop Auckland F.C. players Category:Buxton F.C. players Category:Stocksbridge Park Steels F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Gary Hurlstone
